column2: If found naturally in the game, please contant Priskip and tell him how.
A spark bolt that causes an eneny to cast another spell
Spark bolt with trigger and timer
A spark bolt that casts another spell upon collision and another spell after a timer runs out
Spark bolt with trigger and expiration trigger
A spark bolt that casts another spell upon collision and another spell upon expiring
Destroys a large circle of ground around you
Enemies near you take damage; the damage is higher the lower your health gets. You also take no damage from melee attacks.
Resets the cost of Perk Rerolls
If you stop for a moment, you can sense your location relative to the Mountain.
If you stop for a moment, you can sense the locations of the bosses.
If you stop for a moment, you can sense the locations of secrets.
If you stop for a moment, you can sense the locations of orbs.
Your spells are 5 times as powerful, but your maximum health becomes 100 and cannot be increased by normal hearts.
You gain faster vertical and horizontal movements
Throw a sack of material at your enemies!
Gives the projectile a trail of random material
You constantly fire a devastating plasma beam, but you fire spells much slower
Sucks gold powders nearby and adds them to your wallet
Gold dropped from enemies and gold sucked by Golden Vacuum Fields increased in value.
I sell propane and propane accessories
TODO: Get Letaali to translate Wand of Healing into Finnish
Casts four spells in a cross pattern
The next spell is skipped if the casting wand is below 20% mana
A dark beam of magic reminiscent of a familiar foe
Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a propane tank
Transforms every projectile currently in the air into an explosive duck
The wands you're currently carrying gain 3 additional spell slots (to a maximum of 25).
May darkness fall upon the moon again!\nBut something is missing...
May darkness fall upon the moon again!\nSecrets of utter destruction have been revealed.
May light return to the darkness once again!\nBut something is missing...
May light return to the darkness once again!\nSecrets of utter destruction have been revealed.
Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds.
A mysterious little stone with a thirst for speed
Seems a small jostle could reveal its essence
Enemies can no longer knock you back in addition to no more damage flashes.
Transmute drops of urine from nothing
You regain health from drinking blood. Blood doesn't affect satiation level.
Enemies have a chance to drop miniature health increases.
Gives a projectile a randomly colored sparkly trail
Gives a projectile a rainbow colored sparkly trail
You bleed freezing vapour, but are immune to it and freezing.
Kick the skull into the goals for rewards but don't get too close!
Parallel Master of Masters (Translate this later)
Makes all spells affected no longer emit sound
A spark bolt that casts another spell upon expiring
Spark bolt with timer and expiration trigger
A spark bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out and another spell upon expiring
A spark bolt that casts two new spells after a timer runs out
Spark bolt with double expiration trigger
A spark bolt that casts two new spells upon expiring
A cloud of freezing vapour mist
A small, floating projectile that homes towards nearby creatures and casts another spell upon expiring
Whack you enemies with a big, meaty sausage
A field of unstable transformative magic
Gives a projectile a white sparkly trail
Gives a projectile a black sparkly trail
A dusty old scroll that the gods will surely take kindly too.
Please make an empty spot in your inventory
